topic.title: And here we are
topic.body:
Just got in, took me a whole 5 minutes :) --stupid terminal-- But here I is! 
Curious to see what I'll find, and I also want to really test a theory: privacy reveals ourselves :)

So yeah... hi! :)

1546797562_1En5vgohdFfruuqXmaJ1UJNjonWcG.body:
> [randomshit](#comment_7_18wj1JzTXc2gNiG4MnUvToPyJkB4e6P79r): Welcome to the people's net, enjoy your stay as you may never want to leave.

Thanks dude! It really feels different. This coupled with the fedivers is really starting to look like the next gen of the internet :)

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_606_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): hi cybernex, welcome at this decentralized web hosting network ðŸŒŸ

Glad to be here :)

> [pexo](#comment_44_1DfrA2M9Qra6stqT6tzwNMYNweswY54KAC): Hi!Are you new here?If so, how's the zeronet feeling so far?

It takes a while to get your bearings, but overall it's pretty cool. 
It could use a bit more polish --but I know that's a duh and it's coming :D-- Or maybe I missed some tutorial or guide that shows me what's what. That would be really helpful and it would bring a lot more people to it. Most are just sutck on using the deadnet(facebook, twitter etc.) because they are turned off by how raw the alternatives are. 

I guarantee the moment this becomes more user friendly and has more functions you'll see people coming in droves :D

1534682717_1LN7stzyKrqkA527zMdcJqc4zuiq3.body: Man, Persia was cool as a society... :)

1548012943_14hRA2Pze5PXYZLf8JCm9hknxLZTQ.body:
Yeah, but why?
Is it really that bad? Could we tell? :))
